results.title: Denver the last dinosaur. 3. Dinoland
results.brief_description: When Heather gets a job at a dinosaur theme amusement park, Denver roams freely around the park and fits right in with all the dino-costumed employees. But when the roller coaster gets stuck with kids on board, Denver risks exposing his true identity to perform a daring and heroic rescue.

results.title: Denver the last dinosaur. 2. Big top Denver
results.brief_description: Denver and the kids make friends with a circus owner’s son and help him liven up a lack-lustre show with bicycle and skateboard stunts. The updated circus is a tremendous success and Baxter’s Big Top is saved from financial ruin by Denver and his friends.

results.title: Denver the last dinosaur. 1. The Monster of lost lake
results.brief_description: While camping at a mountain lake with his group of ingenious young friends, Denver, the last dinosaur, is mistaken for a horrible lake monster. Hordes of thrill-seeking tourists descend upon the lake, and the boys must use their wits to protect the environment and their friend.

results.title: Dental health - how and why
results.brief_description: A review of what research and experimentation have done to promote better dental health for the American public, including a report on diet and its relation to the growth and decay on teeth, new sodium fluoride applications and the latest techniques of oral hygiene. Shows different types of teeth, the effect of chewing on a tooth, the correct techniques of cleaning teeth.

results.title: Dental caries in South Africa
results.creator_credit: South Africa. Dept. of Education. Film Services Union
results.brief_description: The film depicts the incidence of the disease in various parts of South Africa, and deals with the following aspects: effects of fluoride; mottling and hypoplasia, contributory causes of decay; preventive measures; correct methods of brushing the teeth; correct diet; regular dental examination.

results.title: Dennis the menace
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, John Hughes, Richard Vane and Nick Castle
results.brief_description: Where Dennis goes, mayhem follows and somehow, most of it seems to land in the lap of his long-suffering next-door neighbour, Mr. Wilson. Cast includes Walter Matthau, Christopher Lloyd, Joan Plowright, Lea Thompson and Mason Gamble as Dennis. Based on Hank Ketcham’s cartoon, Dennis the Menace.

results.title: Dennis O'Hoy: Bendigo Born and Bred
results.brief_description: Interview for the MAP project with lifelong Bendigo resident, Dennis O’Hoy, about his family history in the area, and his great love of, and identification with, the place where he lives.

results.title: Dennis Lillee
results.creator_credit: BBC Enterprises and John E. Bodnar
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Cricketing legends”.
One of cricket’s greatest bowlers, with his thick moustache and bristling aggression, Dennis Lillee was both brilliant and charismatic. His new ball partnership with Jeff Thomson was, perhaps, the most feared in the modern game. Courageous, controversial, and always determined, Lillee overcame serious injury to complete a very distinguished career. This program includes a contribution from Rod Marsh who caught 95 catches from Lillee’s bowling.

results.title: Denmark: [Paul Henningsen]
results.brief_description: A visual interpretation of the pattern and tempo of life in Denmark. Observes fishermen hauling in the catch; loading and unloading of cargo at the dock; farmers bringing their products to market and lighter side of life - holiday making and fun at the local carnival.
